attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: card holders for this medication will be legaly permited to store or carry a limited supply. perscriptions to obtain permits/cards will need authorization from a minimum of two doctors. the sale of this medical cannibis/marijiuana will be provided by pharmacies and/or licenced retailers. if in any case persons smoke the medication in area of the public arrest and/or persicution may be necessary. medical cannabis/marijiuana will be taxed. a new market will open and generate economic value, and provide work for the unemployed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
